meta.description: Optimize the inventory of phones and laptops to maximize profit under space and budget constraints.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products in the store

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per unit of each product

params.name: space
params.description: Floor space required per unit of each product

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per unit of each product

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units to stock for each product

objective.name: max_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from phones and laptops

constraints.name: floor_space_limit
constraints.description: Total floor space used by phones and laptops must not exceed available space

constraints.name: budget_limit
constraints.description: Total cost of phones and laptops must not exceed the budget

constraints.name: laptop_ratio
constraints.description: At least 80% of all appliances in stock must be laptops
